name: Beanie Babies A-Z Quiz Series - I  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these Beanie Babies wears mittens?
questions.explanation:
Icecubes.

	Icecubes is a blue bear.  She wears white mittens and has a white scarf.  She was featured as the January 2006 Beanie Baby of the month. "I really love the cold and snow "The colder the better" is my motto'Cause of the gloves and scarf I wearI am one warm and toasty bear!"

questions.text: Which of these is a polar bear?
questions.explanation:
Icepack.

	Icepack is a polar bear that stands on all fours.  Being a polar bear, he is all white.  There is no poem for Icepack.  Instead, on the Ty Official Website, they put interesting facts about the polar bear, like where he lives and what the scientific name is.

questions.text: Which of these is NOT a bear?
questions.explanation:
Icing.

	Icing is a white seal pup.  He wears a blue bow around his neck. "I'll slip a bit and then I'll slideAcross the ice; I love to glideThen I will do a figure eightGosh, I simply love to skate!"

questions.text: Which of these is a lizard?
questions.explanation:
Iggy.

	Iggy is an iguana.  He is mainly a dark blue and green tie-dye color.  He commonly gets confused with Rainbow, an iguana who is a mostly white iguana with spikes and a tongue sticking out, with a bunch of other colors on him.  Sometimes, the makers even mess up the tags! "Sitting on a rock, basking in the sunIs this iguana's idea of funTowel and glasses, book and beach chairHis life is so perfect without a care!"

questions.text: Which of these is a worm?
questions.explanation:
Inch.

	Inch the inchworm is a multicolored striped worm.  His head is yellow, followed by four different colored segments.  The first segment is orange, the second is green, the third is blue, and the final segment is purple.  He also has black antennae, which can be made out of yarn or string. "Inch the worm is a friend of mineHe goes so slow all the timeInching around from here to thereTraveling the world without a care!"

questions.text: Which of these colors does Independence the bear NOT come in?
questions.explanation:
Green.

	Independence the bear comes in three colors, each to represent the United States flag.  Each of the bears' bows are red, white, and blue striped, and their hats are blue with stars, has a white stripe, with a red rim.  The only difference is their feet and noses, which are either red, white, or blue, depending on the bear.  They each vary in poems. Independence (blue): "Every Independence Day I stand tall and proudly say Let's join together, hand in hand For America, our great homeland!" Independence (red): "Every Independence Day With head held high I proudly say I pledge allegiance to this land And for the freedom which we stand!" Independence (white): "Every Independence Day Hand on heart I proudly say Freedom and liberty are grand That's why I love this, my homeland!"

questions.text: Which of these is a feline?
questions.explanation:
India.

	India is a tiger.  She is orange with white patches and black stripes. "Through jungle shadows I will prowl Don't be afraid, sometimes I growl I'm not fierce, don't run away We'll be best friends and play all day!"

questions.text: Which of these has eight limbs?
questions.explanation:
Inky.

	Inky is an octopus.  Octopi have eight tentacles with suction cups on them.  Inky is most commonly pink, but he also comes in gray.  The two gray varieties are much more rare, especially the gray Inky without a mouth. "Inky's head is big and roundAs he swims he makes no soundIf you need a hand, don't hesitateInky can help because he has eight!"

questions.text: Which of these is a green bear?
questions.explanation:
Ireland.

	Ireland the bear is a green bear with a green bow.  He has the words "I Love Ireland" on his chest, except the word love is a heart. "With the Blarney Stone to make a wishAnd Irish stew, a tasty dishAn Irish jig to dance with gleeIreland's a great place to be!"

questions.text: Which of these bears is a Hamley's exclusive?
questions.explanation:
Ivory.

	Ivory the bear is a creamy ivory color with a gold bow.  This bear has a little button on the chest that says "Hamley's" and has a person on it.  His best friend is Ebony, a black bear very similar to him. "They say that opposites attractAnd I must say that it's a factWith my mate Ebony next to meTwo closer friends you'll ever see!"
